name: Short & Sassy pleated handbag PDF sewing pattern
description:
This original purse pattern designed by Rebeka Lambert is just what it's name entails, "Short & Sassy". This cute little pleated bag can be an expression of you depending on the fabrics you choose - make it cute, make it fun, make it classy, make it YOU!! The possibilities are endless.

This is a PDF pattern that will be emailed to you within 48 hours after payment had been received. This pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with a fully illustrated instructions.

skill level: advanced beginner to intermediate

Materials:
* 1/3 yard fabric A for the Exterior
* 1/2 yard fabric B for Band, Straps, and Pocket
* 1/3 yard fabric for the Lining
* 1 1/3 yard 20” wide light to medium weight fusible interfacing
* 3/4 yard 44” wide heavy weight fusible interfacing
* coordinating thread
* a magnetic snap or button, if desired

finished size of the bag is 13.5" wide x 8.5" tall

This pattern can not be shared or reproduced - it is for the purchaser's use only. Home sewist are welcome make items from this pattern for sale provided credit is given to the designer. Mass manufacturing of items made from this pattern is strictly prohibited. 

All sales are final.

If you have any questions about the pattern, feel free to email me - you have my full support

name: Ava Rose Tote PDF sewing pattern
description:
The Ava Rose Tote is an original design by Rebeka Lambert. This is a versatile, medium sized tote that can be used as an occasional carry all or everyday bag. You can make this bag your own by mixing up your fabric choices to express your individual style. 

Materials:
* 1 yard fabric for exterior (¾ yd fabric A for
body & straps, ¼ yd fabric B for sides/bottom
when making exterior from two fabrics)
* 2/3 yard fabric for lining
* 1 yard 44” wide heavy-weight fusible interfacing
sew-in interfacing (optional)

finished size of bag is 16” wide x 11” tall x 3” deep

The Ava Rose tote is a PDF pattern that will be emailed to you within 48 hours after payment has been received. This pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with a fully illustrated instructions.

skill level: advanced beginner to intermediate

This pattern can not be shared or reproduced - it is for the purchaser's use only. Home sewist are welcome make items from this pattern for sale provided credit is given to the designer. Mass manufacturing of items made from this pattern is strictly prohibited. 

All sales are final.

If you have any questions about the pattern, feel free to email me - you have my full support!!

name: Pretty in Pleats PDf sewing pattern
description:
This original purse pattern designed by Rebeka Lambert is a larger variation of the "Short & Sassy" pleated handbag pattern. 

Pretty in Pleats is a PDF pattern that will be emailed to you within 48 hours after receipt of payment. This pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with a fully illustrated instructions.

skill level: advanced beginner to intermediate

Materials:
· 1/3 yard fabric for the Exterior body
· 1/2 yard fabric for the Lining and Pocket
· 1/2 yard fabric for Purse Top and Straps
· 3/4 yard 22” wide light to medium weight fusible interfacing
· 1 yard 44” wide heavy weight fusible interfacing
· heavy weight sew-in interfacing (optional)
· magnetic snap or loop and button (optional)

finished size of bag is 18” wide x 12” tall

This pattern can not be shared or reproduced - it is for the purchaser's use only. Home sewist are welcome make items from this pattern for sale provided credit is given to the designer. Mass manufacturing of items made from this pattern is strictly prohibited. 


All sales are final.

If you have any questions about the pattern, feel free to email me - you have my full support!!

name: Lily Beth PDF sewing pattern
description:
This original PDF pattern is for a tote style bag made from two contrasting fabrics. The approximate size of the finished bag is 12" tall x 14" wide x 4" deep. The pattern includes 1 interior pocket.

This PDF pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with detailed illustrated instructions.

Materials needed for the bag are:
1/2 yard fabric A 
1/2 yd fabric B 
1/3 yd lining fabric 
1/2 yd fusible fleece 
1/2” button

This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of recepit of payment. Please include the email address you'd like it sent to in "Note to Seller". 

This pattern can not be shared or reproduced - it is for the purchaser's use only. Home sewist are welcome make items from this pattern for sale provided credit is given to the designer. Mass manufacturing of items made from this pattern is strictly prohibited. 

All sales are final.

If you have any questions about the pattern, feel free to email me - you have my full support!!

name: The Erica Bag PDF sewing pattern
description:
This original PDF pattern is for a shaped shoulder bag made from two contrasting fabrics. The approximate size of the finished bag is 13.5" wide x 8" tall x 2.25" deep. The pattern includes 1 interior pocket.

This PDF pattern includes full size pattern pieces along with detailed illustrated instructions.

Materials needed for the bag are:
1/3 yard fabric A 
1/4 yd fabric B 
(or 1/2 yd total for exterior from 1 fabric)
1/2 yd lining fabric 
1 yd heavyweight sew in interfacing
1 package piping or 2 yds (optional)
1/2” button

This pattern will be emailed to you within 24 hours of recepit of payment. Please include the email address you'd like it sent to in "Note to Seller". 

This pattern can not be shared or reproduced - it is for the purchaser's use only. Home sewist are welcome make items from this pattern for sale provided credit is given to the designer. Mass manufacturing of items made from this pattern is strictly prohibited. 

All sales are final.
